column5: First Saturday in April. Was a little crazy in the house yesterday. LOL!
First Saturday in April. Was a little crazy in the house yesterday. LOL! Thank Bruce
Found a old Swap poster from 2013 and it was April 20. last years was March 28th.
First Saturday in April. Was a little crazy in the house yesterday. LOL!  LOL....now worries Sir. It gave me a good chuckle when I read. it.

I have a couple of tables at the swap this year. Not sure of the date but first weekend in Saturday seems ....well not quite right Bruce. Chris, I wonder if Jason should know now, maybe ask him on facebook.
Chris, I wonder if Jason should know now, maybe ask him on facebook.  I talked to Jason about tables over a month ago Bud, that's why I have two.
Thanks fellas. See on that day.
I talked to Jason about tables over a month ago Bud, that's why I have two. Hey Chris.. could you get me his contact as l would like to get 2 also    PLSSSSSSSSSSSSSSSSSS
It was nice to meet some of our local members.. hopefully I'm off the weekend of the swap.. I'd love to try some of Bruce' s salsa I'm sure it will beat store bought by a mile!
Hey Chris.. could you get me his contact as l would like to get 2 also    PLSSSSSSSSSSSSSSSSSS  Go to the Hamilton Bassmasters site Kelvin and make an enquiry. Best I can do for you.
Go to the Hamilton Bassmasters site Kelvin and make an enquiry. Best I can do for you. Thank Chris, did that earlier this afternoon, waiting for a reply back

It was nice to meet some of our local members.. hopefully I'm off the weekend of the swap.. I'd love to try some of Bruce' s salsa I'm sure it will beat store bought by a mile! Just have to ask. I still have some mild and the hotter stuff around. Probably making a medium batch next week.

Just in from the Hamilton G2G event. Thanks to Loonietoons for getting it off the ground as well as thanks to all who attended. We had some wobblies and giggles with many a tale told. The turn out was pretty good and I did try and get a few pictures though not of great quality.    From left to right.... Loonietoon, Old Ironmaker, Wormdunker and HTHM.    Again from left to right Old Ironmaker, Wormdunker, HTHM, Rob (son of Bigugli) and his wife holding their newborn who was camera shy.    Bigugli happy to sell Fish Farmer a jar of his amazing homemade Salsa (I got one too), yeah!    Left to right, again Bigugli (to his right his wife, sorry Judy, damn camera phones!) BITEME. Esq and Pics.    ....and after most everyone had left a late arrival, good to see you again Goran.  My friend Gary who was also there took a few pictures, I'll post when I can.

Great to put a face to the handles, and real names of which I forgot already. A great crew all around. Yes Spiel now I remember that mug of yours, should since we worked together for a year.  It was a pleasure to meet those that I hadn't yet. The baby has to be the youngest OFC er ever. Nice looking family you have there Bruce, or is it Brian or,,,,,Grumpy.
Cool, glad you all enjoyed yourselves
Was great to get out and see everyone.  And, yes, I am very attached to my family. After all, my son is my bestest fishin bud.
Yeah, post Gary's pics when you can.  Cool post, nice to put a face to some of these online presences, looks like you guys had fun and put a few down.

Hey guys, good to meet everyone.  I had a blast!  the fish tales were in abundance.  Did you guys really believe my story of the huge musky on a light rod, with 8 lb line?   It's true! I received a PM from Spiel, - now I wanna pay him a visit to see the Super Spiel Rods.  Gonna leave my wallet at home!  NOT!
Yes it was great to meet some of the members that l have not met before and have fun with the others that l have been friends with for so long  and we did not down a few cold ales

Yes it was great to meet some of the members that l have not met before and have fun with the others that l have been friends with for so long  and we did not down a few cold ales We were drinking lagers and pilsners.
Thanks for posting a picture of this guy. Been a few years.     Nice to read ya all had a good time.

Yes it was nice meeting everyone again.   Got home Bruce and that jar is half empty now I could have stayed there till midnight talking fish tales. Wormdunker we have to meet up at our favorite fishing hole one day this summer  and sit on Mikes patio. Shame we didn't get everyone's picture, I'll see if I can find a picture of Gary and post. Gary taken at his cottage  And a picture of that Muskie I caught on a Spiel Ultra Light Perch Rod we talked about Wormdunker,You can see the rod laying down beside me. let me know when you go to Spiel's   And of course the guy behind the camera Spiel
Awesome!  Looks like a great time!!!
Looks like a blast,we need one in the Barrie area?.Good to see some faces with name's !!!
Nice fellas glad to see folks getting together

Fishfarmer - If you're asking me out on a date!  Sure.  I'll show you my honey hole but, you must agree to be blindfolded!  I happen to have a few pics.  What's your email.  I don't know how to post them here.

Fishfarmer - If you're asking me out on a date!  Sure.  I'll show you my honey hole but, you must agree to be blindfolded!  I happen to have a few pics.  What's your email.  I don't know how to post them here. You have to watch Dave... He hangs around Chris to much.... short poles
Thanks for the time guys it was good to put faces to names kalvin and Chris always a pleasure Chris we will run into each other I'm sure  Thanks guys Peter

We need to do another 3 day event somewhere maybe the kawarthas or something you got to admit they were good times I miss that Pointed is pining as well get the boys up from the south and get a new name on the crayola trophy.  Jumla Jumla Jumla!!!!!  Cheers Peter

We need to do another 3 day event somewhere maybe the kawartha get a new name on the crayola trophy. Jumla Jumla Jumla!!!!!  Cheers Peter I was ROBBED any thing caught under my boat that wins is 1/2 MINE   I'm in
I always say when we are reminiscing and someone says "we had some good old times" yep we did now it's time to make some good new times.
I,ll be out at the swap. What date is it this year?  Bruce, 2 jars of mild please. AND THANK YOU
It was great seeing the old faces again and meeting some new ones..  sorry i made it late...
Just cracked the bottle of Nasty only one word to describe it: FANTASTIC!
I,ll be out at the swap. What date is it this year?  Bruce, 2 jars of mild please. AND THANK YOU First weekend in Saturday, I think??? Haven't rec'd the info yet.
I have a couple of tables at the swap this year. Not sure of the date but first weekend in Saturday seems ....well not quite right Bruce.

I have a couple of tables at the swap this year. Not sure of the date but first weekend in Saturday seems ....well not quite right Bruce. Just got to figure out which month the Saturday is as I will be trying for 2 tables also Chris.. lots of Muskie lures and other stuff to get rid of as I don't need it all.
